fileTabs.content:
select i_item_id
      ,i_item_desc 
      ,i_category 
      ,i_class 
      ,i_current_price
      ,sum(ss_ext_sales_price) as itemrevenue 
      ,sum(ss_ext_sales_price)*100/sum(sum(ss_ext_sales_price)) over
          (partition by i_class) as revenueratio
from	
	store_sales
    	,item 
    	,date_dim
where 
	ss_item_sk = i_item_sk 
  	and i_category in ('Women', 'Electronics', 'Shoes')
  	and ss_sold_date_sk = d_date_sk
	and d_date between cast('2002-05-27' as date) 
				and dateadd(day,30,to_date('2002-05-27'))
group by 
	i_item_id
        ,i_item_desc 
        ,i_category
        ,i_class
        ,i_current_price
order by 
	i_category
        ,i_class
        ,i_item_id
        ,i_item_desc
        ,revenueratio

select  *
from
 (select count(*) h8_30_to_9
 from spark_catalog.qa_database.store_sales, spark_catalog.qa_database.household_demographics , spark_catalog.qa_database.time_dim, spark_catalog.qa_database.store
 where ss_sold_time_sk = time_dim.t_time_sk   
     and ss_hdemo_sk = household_demographics.hd_demo_sk 
     and ss_store_sk = s_store_sk
     and time_dim.t_hour = 8
     and time_dim.t_minute >= 30
     and ((household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 0 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=0+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=1+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = -1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=-1+2)) 
     and store.s_store_name = 'ese') s1,
 (select count(*) h9_to_9_30 
 from spark_catalog.qa_database.store_sales, spark_catalog.qa_database.household_demographics , spark_catalog.qa_database.time_dim, spark_catalog.qa_database.store
 where ss_sold_time_sk = time_dim.t_time_sk
     and ss_hdemo_sk = household_demographics.hd_demo_sk
     and ss_store_sk = s_store_sk 
     and time_dim.t_hour = 9 
     and time_dim.t_minute < 30
     and ((household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 0 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=0+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=1+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = -1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=-1+2))
     and store.s_store_name = 'ese') s2,
 (select count(*) h9_30_to_10 
 from spark_catalog.qa_database.store_sales, spark_catalog.qa_database.household_demographics , spark_catalog.qa_database.time_dim, spark_catalog.qa_database.store
 where ss_sold_time_sk = time_dim.t_time_sk
     and ss_hdemo_sk = household_demographics.hd_demo_sk
     and ss_store_sk = s_store_sk
     and time_dim.t_hour = 9
     and time_dim.t_minute >= 30
     and ((household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 0 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=0+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=1+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = -1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=-1+2))
     and store.s_store_name = 'ese') s3,
 (select count(*) h10_to_10_30
 from store_sales, spark_catalog.qa_database.household_demographics , spark_catalog.qa_database.time_dim, spark_catalog.qa_database.store
 where ss_sold_time_sk = time_dim.t_time_sk
     and ss_hdemo_sk = household_demographics.hd_demo_sk
     and ss_store_sk = s_store_sk
     and time_dim.t_hour = 10 
     and time_dim.t_minute < 30
     and ((household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 0 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=0+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=1+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = -1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=-1+2))
     and store.s_store_name = 'ese') s4,
 (select count(*) h10_30_to_11
 from spark_catalog.qa_database.store_sales, spark_catalog.qa_database.household_demographics , spark_catalog.qa_database.time_dim, spark_catalog.qa_database.store
 where ss_sold_time_sk = time_dim.t_time_sk
     and ss_hdemo_sk = household_demographics.hd_demo_sk
     and ss_store_sk = s_store_sk
     and time_dim.t_hour = 10 
     and time_dim.t_minute >= 30
     and ((household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 0 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=0+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=1+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = -1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=-1+2))
     and store.s_store_name = 'ese') s5,
 (select count(*) h11_to_11_30
 from spark_catalog.qa_database.store_sales, spark_catalog.qa_database.household_demographics , spark_catalog.qa_database.time_dim, spark_catalog.qa_database.store
 where ss_sold_time_sk = time_dim.t_time_sk
     and ss_hdemo_sk = household_demographics.hd_demo_sk
     and ss_store_sk = s_store_sk 
     and time_dim.t_hour = 11
     and time_dim.t_minute < 30
     and ((household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 0 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=0+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=1+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = -1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=-1+2))
     and store.s_store_name = 'ese') s6,
 (select count(*) h11_30_to_12
 from spark_catalog.qa_database.store_sales, spark_catalog.qa_database.household_demographics , spark_catalog.qa_database.time_dim, spark_catalog.qa_database.store
 where ss_sold_time_sk = time_dim.t_time_sk
     and ss_hdemo_sk = household_demographics.hd_demo_sk
     and ss_store_sk = s_store_sk
     and time_dim.t_hour = 11
     and time_dim.t_minute >= 30
     and ((household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 0 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=0+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=1+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = -1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=-1+2))
     and store.s_store_name = 'ese') s7,
 (select count(*) h12_to_12_30
 from spark_catalog.qa_database.store_sales, spark_catalog.qa_database.household_demographics , spark_catalog.qa_database.time_dim, spark_catalog.qa_database.store
 where ss_sold_time_sk = time_dim.t_time_sk
     and ss_hdemo_sk = household_demographics.hd_demo_sk
     and ss_store_sk = s_store_sk
     and time_dim.t_hour = 12
     and time_dim.t_minute < 30
     and ((household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 0 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=0+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = 1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=1+2) or
          (household_demographics.hd_dep_count = -1 and household_demographics.hd_vehicle_count<=-1+2))
     and store.s_store_name = 'ese') s8

select  
   substr(w_warehouse_name,1,20)
  ,sm_type
  ,cc_name
  ,sum(case when (cs_ship_date_sk - cs_sold_date_sk <= 30 ) then 1 else 0 end)  as days_30
  ,sum(case when (cs_ship_date_sk - cs_sold_date_sk > 30) and 
                 (cs_ship_date_sk - cs_sold_date_sk <= 60) then 1 else 0 end )  as days_31_60 
  ,sum(case when (cs_ship_date_sk - cs_sold_date_sk > 60) and 
                 (cs_ship_date_sk - cs_sold_date_sk <= 90) then 1 else 0 end)  as days_61_90
  ,sum(case when (cs_ship_date_sk - cs_sold_date_sk > 90) and
                 (cs_ship_date_sk - cs_sold_date_sk <= 120) then 1 else 0 end)  as days_90_120
  ,sum(case when (cs_ship_date_sk - cs_sold_date_sk  > 120) then 1 else 0 end)  as days_more_than_120
from
   spark_catalog.qa_database.catalog_sales
  ,spark_catalog.qa_database.warehouse
  ,spark_catalog.qa_database.ship_mode
  ,spark_catalog.qa_database.call_center
  ,spark_catalog.qa_database.date_dim
where
    d_month_seq between 1200 and 1200 + 11
and cs_ship_date_sk   = d_date_sk
and cs_warehouse_sk   = w_warehouse_sk
and cs_ship_mode_sk   = sm_ship_mode_sk
and cs_call_center_sk = cc_call_center_sk
group by
   substr(w_warehouse_name,1,20)
  ,sm_type
  ,cc_name
order by substr(w_warehouse_name,1,20)
        ,sm_type
        ,cc_name
limit 100
